original_title: Dong of The Dead - The Craft XXX Double Feature
overview: The Craft XXX: What do three goth girls gotta do to get a date? They have to cast a spell and make a man magically appear. Will this man be the answer to their problems - or will jealousy tear them apart?  Dong Of The Dead: Joanna and Andy want to go out to a Halloween party wearing their skimpiest French maid outfits, but there's a zombie on the loose with a craving for sluts... Nothing can stop the girls from having a fun Halloween... even if that means fucking a zombie to death. Enjoy this bloody comedy.
title: Dong of The Dead - The Craft XXX Double Feature
